Flow.description:
Explanation of the Flow This Record-Triggered Flow in Salesforce is designed to create an invoice in QuickBooks when an Opportunity record is updated. The flow checks for a status change in the Opportunity and calls an Apex action to trigger the invoice creation.
Flow Breakdown Trigger:
Object: Opportunity Trigger Condition: A record is updated Entry Conditions: Field: zPD_Est_Status__c is changed â†’ True **Field: zPD_Est_Status__c Equals "Invoice Created"` Optimization: Actions and Related Records Flow Path:
Immediate Path: Ends the flow if conditions are not met. Asynchronous Path: Calls an Apex Action (CreateInvoice) to send the Opportunity ID to the Breadwinner API, which creates an invoice in QuickBooks. Purpose This flow ensures that when an Opportunity's status is changed to "Invoice Created," a corresponding invoice is generated in QuickBooks using Breadwinner.
Flow.label: RTF - Opportunity - Update - Create QuickBooks Invoice
